title: Updating boots.
body:
As of right now, each boots is just a small boost to one stat, with some of them giving a small passive boost.

We can do better.

**Predator**

Most of the boots proposed have active abilities. If you have one of these boots, you can activate predator by holding alt and pressing the boots hotkey.

{{item:3006}} **Berserkers Greaves**
{{item:1001}} + {{item:1043}} + 150g (1450 total)

45 movement speed
+25% attack speed

(Unique) Active - Enrage: apply a mark to a target enemy for 8 seconds, reducing their armor and magic resist by 15. While this is active, reduce your own armor and magic resist by 15. 16 second CD.
Anyone who damages the marked enemy gains 15% attack speed and 20 movement speed for 1.5 seconds.

{{item:3009}} **Boots of Swiftness**
{{item:1001}} +{{item:1036}} /{{item:1052}}  + X gold (1300 total)

Can be built out of either long sword or amplifying tome.

50 movement speed
12 AD or 24 AP (adaptive)

(Unique) Active - Sprint: For the next 2.5 seconds, gain 25% movement speed (18% for ranged) and resist slows by 50%. Does not cleanse slows, only temporarily ignores them. 12 second CD.

{{item:3117}} **Boots of Mobility**
{{item:1001}} + {{item:1006}} + 850g (1300 total)

25 movement speed

(Unique) Passive - Nomad: While out of Combat, gain 90 additional movement speed and 30 HP5.

{{item:3158}} **Ionian Boots of Lucidity**
{{item:1001}} + {{item:3067}} + 300g (1400 total)

45 movement speed
220 HP
10% CDR

(Unique) Passive - Dream: While out of combat, recharge abilities, items, and summoner spells 10% faster. Affects spells cast while not under the effects of Dream, and stacks multiplicitively with other forms of CDR. While Wake is on CD, Dream cannot take effect.
(Unique) Active - Wake: Gain vision of a target area for 5 seconds. 600 radius, global range. 40 second CD.

{{item:3111}} **Mercury Treads**
{{item:1001}} + {{item:3140}} + 400g (2000 total)

45 movement speed
30 magic resist

(Unique) Active - Quicksilver: Remove all disables. 90 second CD.

{{item:3047}} **Ninja Tabi**
{{item:1001}} + {{item:1031}} +200g (1300 total)

45 movement  speed
40 armor

(Unique) Passive - Block: Blocks 15 damage from champion attacks and spells.

{{item:3020}} **Sorcerer's Shoes**
{{item:1001}} + {{item:1052}} + 565g (1300 total)

50 movement speed
20 AP

(Unique) Toggle - Ritual
On - Unholy Mirror: Your spells deal 15% bonus damage. In payment, you also take this damage.
Off - Essence Eater: +3% spell vamp.
